description: Professionals who design, develop, test, and maintain software applications and systems

career_levels.title: Junior Software Engineer
key_responsibilities: Write clean, maintainable code under supervision
Fix bugs and implement small features
Participate in code reviews
Learn team processes and coding standards
Collaborate with team members on assigned tasks
required_skills: Proficiency in at least one programming language
Understanding of data structures and algorithms
Basic knowledge of version control (Git)
Familiarity with software development lifecycle
Problem-solving abilities
nice_to_have: Computer Science degree or bootcamp certification

career_levels.title: Software Engineer
key_responsibilities: Independently design and implement features
Write technical documentation
Participate in architectural discussions
Mentor junior engineers
Estimate project timelines
Debug complex production issues
required_skills: Strong proficiency in multiple programming languages
Experience with databases (SQL and/or NoSQL)
Understanding of API design and microservices
Knowledge of testing practices and frameworks
Solid understanding of software design patterns
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
nice_to_have: Contributions to technical blog or conference talks
career_levels.promotion_criteria: Demonstrates consistent high-quality work, shows initiative, mentors others effectively

career_levels.title: Senior Software Engineer
key_responsibilities: Lead technical design for major features or systems
Make architectural decisions for team projects
Mentor multiple engineers and conduct technical interviews
Drive technical standards and best practices
Influence product roadmap with technical insights
Handle complex performance optimization and scalability challenges
required_skills: Expert-level coding skills in primary language(s)
Deep understanding of system design and architecture
Experience scaling applications to high traffic
Strong debugging and problem-solving skills
Excellent technical communication
Experience with distributed systems
Knowledge of security best practices
career_levels.promotion_criteria: Demonstrates technical leadership, influences team direction, delivers high-impact projects

career_levels.title: Staff Software Engineer
key_responsibilities: Define technical strategy for multiple teams or entire product areas
Lead cross-team technical initiatives
Identify and resolve organizational technical debt
Establish engineering standards across the organization
Mentor senior engineers and influence hiring strategy
Represent engineering in company-wide strategic planning
required_skills: Exceptional technical expertise across multiple domains
Strong architectural vision and execution
Ability to influence without direct authority
Strategic thinking and business acumen
Outstanding communication skills with technical and non-technical audiences
Experience leading large-scale technical migrations
career_levels.promotion_criteria: Demonstrates organizational impact, technical thought leadership, ability to multiply effectiveness of others

career_levels.title: Principal/Distinguished Engineer
key_responsibilities: Set technical vision for the entire engineering organization
Drive company-wide technical strategy and innovation
Represent the company in industry forums and conferences
Solve the most complex technical challenges
Influence technology choices at the highest level
Build engineering culture and attract top talent
required_skills: Recognized expert in their field
Track record of solving unprecedented technical challenges
Ability to influence industry trends
Executive-level communication and strategic thinking
Deep understanding of business strategy and technology alignment
career_levels.promotion_criteria: Demonstrates company-wide technical impact, industry recognition, transformational leadership

adjacent_roles.transition_path: From Senior Software Engineer or Staff Engineer with demonstrated people leadership interest
adjacent_roles.key_differences: Focus shifts from technical execution to people management, team performance, and organizational effectiveness

adjacent_roles.transition_path: From Senior or Staff Engineer with strong client-facing and system design skills
adjacent_roles.key_differences: More customer-facing, broader technical breadth, focus on designing solutions for clients

adjacent_roles.transition_path: From Software Engineer with interest in infrastructure, automation, and operations
adjacent_roles.key_differences: Focus on infrastructure, deployment, and operational excellence rather than feature development

adjacent_roles.transition_path: From Software Engineer with interest in data systems, pipelines, and analytics infrastructure
adjacent_roles.key_differences: Specialized focus on data processing, ETL, and analytics infrastructure
